scripts.migrate: read -p 'Enter migration name: ' name && npx prisma migrate dev --name "$name" --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma migrate dev --name "$name" --schema=./prismaTest/schema.test.prisma
scripts.generate: npx prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate --schema=./prismaTest/schema.test.prisma
scripts.updateDatabase: npm run migrate && npm run generate
